Description: Intaglio; sard; Isis seated to right on sphinx; lotus on head; sceptre in right hand; crown of North and South Egypt in right; statuette of Harpocrates before her; in a gilt mount.
Curator's comments: Text from Dalton 1915, Catalogue of Engraved Gems: B.M. Cat. of Gems, 1888, no. 1219.
Bibliographic references: Dalton 1915 / Catalogue of the Engraved Gems of the Post-Classical Periods in the Department of British and Mediaeval Antiquities and Ethnography in the British Museum. (782)
Additional IDs: Other BM number: 1872,0604.1259 (Greek and Roman reg.no)
